alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Knox; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:59PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There remains some uncertainty on how far east advisory-level snow may spread. The current forecast trends reveal locations along and west of a Galesburg to Springfield line will stand the best chance at the higher-end snowfall totals. There, snowfall rates may become heavy, particularly between 7 PM and Midnight CST when hourly rates may exceed 1" per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling, or consider delaying your travel plans all together. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
